Articles.Content:
I just posted my first stock spaceplane to kerbalx & wanted to show it off.  Takes 5 crew to LKO with 2000 m/s remaining.  If the LF (only) is refilled in orbit, it will have over 4000 m/s for interplanetary missions.  Has RCS & docking capability.  It was built as a crew shuttle to orbit and/or a Laythe interface craft to replace a larger, more expensive design.

https://kerbalx.com/cavscout74/CS-08S-Lightning
